activities.title: PF Study Session
activities.description: This time slot will be reserved to every student that wants to study and receive tutoring!

activities.title: [Workshop] Git Good
activities.description: In almost every group project, the most used program, in order to version control the entire project, is git. This talk will show the workflow of git and all it's glory, so that you can git good!

activities.title: [Talk] Website √† la Carte
activities.description: Learn Web Dev by building an actual website  in a choose your own adventure manner. Come with me in this adventure of learning one of the most in demand market skills.

activities.title: Chess Tournament
activities.description: This will be a remote chess tournament, so that everyone interested can join! Let's take a break from all the programming nonsense and focus on some real thinking.

activities.title: [Workshop] Shell Basics
activities.description: Every programmer is aware that the most powerful tool we have at our dispose is the shell and its scripting tools. The main goal of this talk is to introduce the basics of shell to an unexperienced audience.

activities.title: Coffee Break
activities.description: How about a little break? This will be a gathering moment for everyone @ CodeWeek, come and join us!

activities.title: [Round Table] How would my life be in the future?
activities.description: Have you ever wonder how would your life be in the future? That's crazy, right? We bring some people to tell you about their lives after graduating in Software Engineer here @ University of Minho.

activities.title: LI1/PF Study Session
activities.description: This time slot will be reserved to every student that wants to study and receive tutoring.

activities.title: [Talk] Why Elixir?
activities.description: There is a simple and short answer to the question: "What is the best programming language?", which is: "It depends". Despite that, If I really had to elect one, I would choose Elixir. Elixir is a functional, concurrent, general-purpose programming language that runs on the BEAM. Created in 2012, it has been the backbone of CeSIUM's software stack and used to write and re-write almost all of its software products/services. In this talk, we will dive into the main reasons for it, whence the name, "Why Elixir?".

activities.title: Coffee Break
activities.description: How about a little break? This will be a gathering moment for everyone @ CodeWeek, come and join us!

activities.title: [Talk] Linux Showcase
activities.description: Have you heard of Linux? Whether yes or not, this is the place for you. This showcase aims to show you everything about the world of Linux. From its creation to all the families and distributions that are out there. This is general culture, at least that's what I think!
